item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

Tree:

I have to agree with lawl on this matter.

Treemo, I tried to PM you about something but it said that your inbox is full.

So here:
[hr]
Look, I’m sorry. I messed up, but it’s in the past now.

If you have another forum, and if anyone is there like iDork, Hell Fox, DesecratedX, or anyone that would remember me tell them I’m sorry. I will not be going back into the blackmarket. I left that past behind me. That does not mean however I will cease my advancement in Java.

-Sleep
[hr]
